In the event that you have not yet obtained your new certificate, then please ensure that you apply for it immediately (if you have not already done so) and provide us with a copy within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that failure to renew your Civil Defence Certificate may invalidate your insurance policies.  This means that any insurance claim you make may be rejected by your insurer, which may lead to you incurring additional costs and being in breach of your Lease.  

 

I look forward to hearing from you.

 

 

Regards,

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​
